channel.title: CVE Feed for LINE Corporation -- Central Dogma
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LINE Corporation -- Central Dogma

item.title: CVE-2019-6002|2024-08-04T20:09:24.032Z -- line%20corporation -- central%20dogma
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Central Dogma 0.17.0 to 0.40.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-38388|2024-08-04T01:37:16.527Z -- line%20corporation -- central%20dogma
item.description: Central Dogma allows privilege escalation with mirroring to the internal dogma repository that has a file managing the authorization of the project.
